level.heading: Confidentiality of identity in publications.
level.text: Any publication by any medical utilization review committee, peer review committee, medical staff committee or tissue review committee shall keep confidential the identity of any patient whose condition, care or treatment was a part thereof.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-112, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 44-801.
